file_insights.description: Extracted EventCard component with reusable event display logic
Simplified EventsScreen by extracting event rendering logic to EventCard component

patterns_discovered: Consistent UI card design with flexible props
gotchas_discovered: Truncation of long text in card view

approach_outcome.refactoring_benefit: Improved code reusability and separation of concerns

recommendations: Consider extracting date formatting logic to a shared utility function
Add prop type validation using PropTypes or TypeScript
Create a more robust icon mapping system for event types
Add accessibility attributes to the EventCard component
